Neighbors	American	comedy	Edward F Cline Buster Keaton	buster keaton virginia fox play young lovers live tenements rear face backyards separated wooden fence families constantly feuding lovers relationship morning buster virginia exchange love letters holes fence much disdain families insist stay away one another buster sneaks virginias bedroom window parents arguing caught virginias father ties washing lines slowly sends back familys house much arguing fighting two families eventually go court settle differences buster demands right marry virginia judge insists two families interfere plans day wedding two families naturally hostile one another wedding delayed due busters belt repeatedly breaking resulting pants continuously falling virginias father discovers ring buster intends give virginia cheap 10cent ring purchased woolworths angrily calls wedding drags virginia home determined rescue love help two groomsmen buster uses trapeze skills snag virginia two run together eventually finding coal shed blacksmith ordained minister pronounces husband wife
